comment.author: 7279101@N06
comment._content: Date 12/5/13 in upper left. Rudolf Hober? en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rudolf_H%c3%b6ber

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: Wow - you have very sharp eyes! Thanks for sending the date and first name. We'll add them to the catalog record when we update.

comment.author: 52638914@N03
comment._content: This is NOT Rudolf Hoeber the physiologist (name originally spelled with an umlaut over the "o").  The image on the Wikipedia page is wrong, probably picked up erroneously from this LOC site.  I know because Rudolf was my grandfather and I knew him when I was a child and have many pictures of him, none of which resemble this one.  I have no idea who the man in this picture is, but it is not my grandfather.

comment.author: 52638914@N03
comment._content: The Rudolf Hober entry in Wikipedia has now been corrected by removing the image shown here and replacing it with an image of the real Rudolf Hoeber.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: LOC, you should revise caption to reflect that the wrong Rudolf Hober was originally identified.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog: Thanks for bringing this to our attention.  We'll fix the description next time we update.
